text: is a Japanese politician who has been the Minister for Foreign Affairs since 2024. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2000. Iwaya was the Minister of Defense from 2 October 2018 to 11 September 2019. In September 2024, incoming Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba picked Iwaya as the next Foreign Minister, replacing Yōko Kamikawa. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ōita Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Defense ministers of Japan
title: Takeshi Iwaya
